______ FlagZone ______

FlagZone is a PvP arena where players compete againt each other in firece battles for glory and rewards.
// Each player entering the FlagZone will be flagged until they leave the area.
// Upon death each player will be rewived after 15 seconds and placed in one of the 5 spawn locations.
// At all times player will have Noblesse Blessing so there'll be no need to re-apply buffs.
// FlagZone is a Free for All arena where no team rules apply. AIO skills will hurt everyone.
// Every player will have their name and title replaced with "Unknown". No Clan crest will be visible.
// DualBox kills will not be counted.
// One player cannot kill another more than 3 times in a row if he want to receive a reward.
// When in FlagZone player will be unable to logout.
// Each legit kill will reward player with 1 Dwarven PvP Reward Box
Good Luck!
